lead_paragraph: FROM WEST TO EAST California and the Making of the American Mind By Stephen Schwartz 566 pages. The Free Press. $30. To begin with, the title of Stephen Schwartz's new book, ''From West to East: California and the Making of the American Mind,'' is highly deceptive. Although the book purports to be ''a history of the California intellect and the California cultural identity'' and ''the impact of California on the United States and the world,'' it is actually a polemical chronicle of radical and left-wing movements in (and to some extent outside) California.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews Stephen Schwartz book From West To East: California and the Making of the American Mind; photo (M)

headline.main: Anatomy of the Left Coast Without the Sunshine
